paper_abstract: In this paper, we develop the basic stability theory for g-frames and g-Riesz bases in Hilbert C*-module. Also, we study stability of the dual g-frames in Hilbert C*-module. We extend the Casazza-Christensen perturbation theorem to g-frames in Hilbert C*-module but this is not valid for g-Riesz bases. We prove some characterizations of g-frames and g-Riesz bases in Hilbert C*-module.
paper_title: On stability of g-frames and g-Riesz bases in Hilbert C*-modules
